      • getInfo

        public abstract java.lang.String getInfo()
        Gets basic information from playlist.
        Returns:
        Returns a string with all the basic information from the playlist.

      • addSong

        public abstract java.lang.String addSong(Song song,
                                         Playlist playlist)
        Adds a song to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        song - A Song Object that will be added to the playlist. song != null.
        playlist - A Playlist Object that will receive the added song. playlist != null.
        Returns:
        Returns a string with the result of the operation.

      • durationIntToString

        public java.lang.String durationIntToString(int duration)
        Gets duration in seconds and converts it to String format (mm:ss)
        Parameters:
        duration - An integer representing duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        Returns String with duration in format (mm:ss).

        public void increaseSongsAmount(int songsAmount)
        Increase the amount of songs in the playlist.
        Parameters:
        songsAmount - An integer representing the current song amount.

      • updateDuration

        public void updateDuration(int duration)
        Updates duration of the playlist based on the sum of the duration of all the playlist songs.
        Parameters:
        duration - An integer representing the duration of the recent added song.

      • updateGenres

        public void updateGenres(java.lang.String songGenre)
        Updates genres of the playlist based on the genres of all the playlist songs.
        Parameters:
        songGenre - A String representing the genre of the recent added song.
